name: reindustrialization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of developing industry again: The growth in green technology could mean reindustrialization of the whole planet, but in an environmentally friendly way. The site has been chosen for reindustrialisation.
More examplesFewer examplesThe unions are campaigning for regional reindustrialisation to create new jobs to replace those lost by the factory closures.She stood for election on a policy of reindustrialization of the country, which was popular with voters.The deindustrialization at the end of the last century needs to be reversed and reindustrialization is now called for.
